text: @MayorJenny Here's a thought. Why don't you tell your thugs to go home. Remember we're in a pandimic! You have the nerve to blame @realDonaldTrump for the spikes in covid cases & scream that he's responsible for all the Covid19 deaths.!! You're PATHETIC! You & the rest of the communists
